com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.drive

Class TankDrive

  • Drive
    • com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.drive.TankDrive

  • public class TankDrive
extends Drive

    This class provides basic functionality of a tank/differential drive using on class TankKinematics.

    See Also:
    class TankKinematics

      Default localizer for tank drivetrains based on the drive encoders.
